category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_rename_foreignfile_filename
preference.preference_description: Specifies the actions permitted on foreign files during a save process. Foreign files can be independently renamed during a save process depending on the three character value of this preference; each character represents the setting for a specific save operation. For example: 0 = renaming the foreign file is not permitted during this operation (see below) 1 = renaming the foreign file is permitted during this operation (see below) The value of the first character applies to the Save As operation. The value of the second character applies to the Save Existing operation. The value of the third character applies to the Save New Revision operation. The default value is 111, indicating that foreign files may be independently renamed during the Save As, Save Existing and Save New Revision operations
